entry.title: Coinbase Adds Solana Staking Rewards—With Higher Return Than Ethereum
entry.summary: Coinbase users can now earn passive yield as high as 3.85% by holding their SOL in the Solana network through their Coinbase accounts.

entry.title: Bitcoin ‘Optimist’ Alex Adelman Calls NFTs ‘Perfect Intersection of Culture and Technology’
entry.summary: The Lolli CEO told Decrypt that Bitcoin “should have captured” the NFT uprising—but there’s still time.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Puts Another $10M in Bitcoin—Despite Price Crashing Below $20K
entry.summary: MicroStrategy has so far lost money on its Bitcoin bet, but that isn’t stopping the company from buying more of the cryptocurrency.

entry.title: Lido Community Signals Intent to Keep Ethereum Staking Uncapped
entry.summary: The Lido community is currently voting against a proposal that would limit how much Ethereum can be staked on the platform.

entry.title: North Korea's $400M Crypto Losses Could Hurt Its Nuclear Weapons Program: Report
entry.summary: North Korea’s ill-gotten crypto gains have plunged in value—which could impact on its nuclear weapons program, according to a new report.

entry.title: Crypto Fund Three Arrows Capital Ordered to Liquidate: Report
entry.summary: A court in the British Virgin Islands has ordered Singapore-based crypto fund Three Arrows Capital to be liquidated, according to recent reports.

entry.title: Chia Aims to Take on Ethereum, Solana With NFTs. Will They Blossom?
entry.summary: Bram Cohen’s storage-based crypto network Chia just launched NFTs on its mainnet. Can a robust market sprout from the new standard?

entry.title: Bitcoin Dips Below $20,000 as Crypto Market Pressure Intensifies
entry.summary: Amid yet another crypto market correction, the price of Bitcoin fell to a weekly low under $20,000 on Wednesday morning.

entry.title: Compass Mining CEO and CFO Resign, Company Cites 'Setbacks and Disappointments'
entry.summary: The Bitcoin mining firm elevates two executives to interim co-CEOs in bid to achieve the "next level of growth."

entry.title: Snoop Dogg: Crypto Bear Market ‘Weeded Out’ Those ‘Abusing the Opportunities’
entry.summary: He also said record labels soon will realize their IP is “better served on the blockchain than sitting in the catalog collecting cobwebs.”

entry.title: Nexo Says It’s Nothing Like Celsius and Other Crypto Lenders. Here's What the Data Shows
entry.summary: While Nexo fights to clear its name, some of the lender's largest wallets, including what Nansen says is its on-chain corporate treasury, show a $838 million balance.

entry.title: NFT NYC: How Dequency Is Using Blockchain to Decentralize Music Usage Rights
entry.summary: Just ahead of a live event during NFT NYC from BeetsDAO and Decrypt, Margaret Link and Keatly Haldeman of Dequency talk to Decrypt EIC Dan Roberts about how their company is using the Algorand blockchain to de-bug the decades-old process of music synchronization rights.

entry.title: CoinFLEX Says 'Bitcoin Jesus' Roger Ver Is Behind Its Withdrawal Troubles, $47M Debt
entry.summary: CoinFLEX CEO Mark Lamb took to Twitter today to accuse longtime Bitcoin evangelist Roger Ver of defaulting on a $47 million loan.

entry.title: Anchorage Digital Announces Ethereum Staking For Institutions
entry.summary: The crypto storage firm will allow institutions to stake the second-largest digital asset by market cap.

entry.title: Axie Infinity’s Ethereum Bridge Back Online After $622M Hack
entry.summary: The Ronin bridge is back online more than three months after attackers completed one of the largest DeFi heists to date.

entry.title: HTC's New Metaverse Phone Includes Crypto and NFT Wallet
entry.summary: The HTC Desire 22 Pro comes preloaded with "Viverse" apps to navigate the metaverse and manage your crypto and NFTs.

entry.title: Crypto Data Firm Kaiko Raises $53M, Defying Bear Market
entry.summary: Kaiko has raised fresh funds to strengthen its position in the crypto data market, tripling its valuation.

entry.title: Crypto.com Removes Dogecoin, Shiba Inu, Others From Earn Program
entry.summary: The crypto exchange is cutting DOGE, SHIB, and 13 other coins from Earn, but adding ZIL, NEAR, and FTM.

entry.title: Harmony Hackers Begin Laundering Ethereum Stolen From Horizon Bridge
entry.summary: The thieves have sent $36 million of the $100 million in stolen Ethereum to a mixing service.

entry.title: Who’s Firing—And Still Hiring—During the Bitcoin Bear Market
entry.summary: Some crypto companies are feeling the crunch of a market crash and reducing their employee headcount to cope—but others are still expanding and securing fresh talent. Here's who's hiring and firing in crypto right now.

entry.title: SEC Chair Gensler Again Says Bitcoin Is Not a Security. What About Ethereum?
entry.summary: The head of the Commission says he will only comment on Bitcoin, despite public statements by former SEC officials.

entry.title: FTX Eyeing Purchase of Robinhood: Report
entry.summary: FTX denied the Bloomberg report, saying there are "no active M&A conversations about Robinhood currently taking place."

entry.title: Goldman Sachs Downgrades Coinbase Shares, Predicts 60% Revenue Decline
entry.summary: America’s biggest crypto exchange is laying off 18% of its workforce. A Goldman analyst said that’s not enough.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds Saw $453M in Outflows Last Week: CoinShares
entry.summary: The ProShares Short Bitcoin Strategy ETF also saw $15.3 million in inflows amid the ongoing crypto bear market.

entry.title: Voyager Digital Issues Three Arrows Capital With Default Notice
entry.summary: 3AC has yet to repay its debt to Voyager Digital. Now, the latter has issued a default notice as part of its attempts to recover the loan.

entry.title: Australian Crypto Firm Banxa to Cut Staff by 30% Citing ‘Another Crypto Winter’
entry.summary: Banxa is slashing its headcount from 230 to 160 as the crypto industry’s ongoing bear market continues to weigh heavy.

entry.title: Dogecoin Jumps 9% as Trading Volume Surges
entry.summary: Elon Musk’s favorite cryptocurrency Dogecoin is up nearly 10%, becoming one of the crypto market’s largest gainers on Monday.

entry.title: ApeCoin Gains 22% After Debut of Bored Ape-Themed Video With Eminem and Snoop Dogg
entry.summary: The bump signifies a minor recovery for the token, which recently shed over 65% of its value in a single month.

entry.title: Harmony Offers $1M Bounty After Discovering $100M Altcoin Hack
entry.summary: Hackers stole WETH, AAVE, SUSHI, DAI, USDT and USDC, and then swapped them for ETH.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Pussy Riot vs. UkraineDAO and SBF Bails Out BlockFi
entry.summary: Meanwhile, Ethereum co-creator Vitalik Buterin once again criticized the stock-to-flow pricing model for Bitcoin, calling it "harmful."

entry.title: A Tale of Two NFT Parties: Doodles vs. Goblintown
entry.summary: Forget it, Jake. It's Goblintown.

entry.title: Can Move-to-Earn NFT Game Stepn Avoid the Pitfalls of Axie Infinity?
entry.summary: It’s important to recognize Stepn’s pioneering role in the emerging move-to-earn field, just as it’s important the company keeps adapting.

entry.title: SAND Gains Almost 20% in Wake of Tech Giants' Metaverse Announcement
entry.summary: The Sandbox's COO said again on Saturday an acquisition by Meta "will never happen." SAND is mooning anyway.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum Lead Sizable Recovery Among Top Cryptocurrencies
entry.summary: Also: Jerome Powell and Christine Lagarde argued in favor of regulations.

entry.title: Yuga Labs Lawsuit Accuses Ryder Ripps of 'Scamming Consumers' With Fake Bored Apes
entry.summary: The suit claims that the artist's "deliberate effort" to devalue Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs is "no mere monkey business."

entry.title: Peter Thiel-Backed Bitcoin Trading Platform Bitpanda Cuts Staff
entry.summary: The company cited a variety of reasons, including an excessive growth rate and “changing market sentiment.”

entry.title: Why Solana Is Going Big on Mobile—And Making a Smartphone
entry.summary: Solana co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko tells Decrypt about its new SMS platform and Android phone, the Solana Saga.

entry.title: Bored Ape Founders Respond to 'Crazy Disinformation Campaign' From 'Demented Troll'
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs are made by Nazi racists? An elaborate troll has gone far enough, BAYC co-founder says.

entry.title: Celsius Enlists More Advisers to Help With Potential Bankruptcy: Report
entry.summary: Celsius is headed towards bankruptcy—and looking for help, sources tell the Wall Street Journal.

entry.title: FTX Plans to Acquire Stake in Battered Crypto Lender BlockFi: Report
entry.summary: FTX recently provided BlockFi with a $250 million bailout.

entry.title: Powell: Congress to Receive Guidance from Federal Reserve on CBDC
entry.summary: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said a digital currency issued by the U.S. Central Bank is ‘a very important potential financial innovation.’

entry.title: The Bill Murray 1,000 NFT Project Reveal Trailer
entry.summary: A first look at actor Bill Murray's upcoming Ethereum NFT project with The Chive and Project Venkman.

entry.title: gm: Meet 'Move to Earn' NFT App Stepn
entry.summary: Stepn is the talk of Crypto Twitter: an app that rewards you in crypto for exercising outdoors. But first you have to buy a pricey sneaker NFT. Stepn CMO Shiti Manghani joined the gm podcast to talk about how the app works, its GST and GMT tokens, Stepn's recent decision regarding China, and why the future for NFTs is utility.

entry.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.

entry.title: #DecryptLive: Luxury Fashion Brands Are Going Crypto
entry.summary: From Dolce & Gabbana to Balmain, big names in fashion are embracing crypto and NFTs. Decrypt's Stephen Graves, Dan Roberts, Sander Lutz and contributor Alys Keys discuss the trend.

entry.title: Collateralized Monkey JPEGs: CEO of Arcade Talks to Decrypt at Consensus
entry.summary: Arcade, an NFT liquidity provider, says it's facilitating $25 million in loans against blue-chip NFTs like Bored Apes. Arcade CEO Gabe Frank talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Consensus 2022.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is a Dapp?
entry.summary: A dapp is a decentralized app built on blockchains to give you more ownership and freedom in your digital life. Dapps are the next generation of software. Explore the vast selection of dapps on Ethereum today. Curious how to build dapps? Start building free at infura.io.

entry.title: Bringing 'Snow Crash' to Life: Neal Stephenson Talks to Decrypt at Consensus
entry.summary: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.

entry.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch
entry.summary: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”

entry.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT
entry.summary: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.

entry.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy
entry.summary: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.

entry.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis
entry.summary: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.

entry.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA
entry.summary: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.

entry.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next
entry.summary: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.
